title: NO Price Hike : Litro reverses decision to increase prices
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Litro has decided to suspend its decision to increase prices of domestic gas cylinders, as per a government directive, the company announced on Friday (22).
The price of a 12.5 kg domestic gas cylinder increased to Rs. 5,175/- with effect from midnight on Friday (22), said Litro Gas earlier.
#PriceHike : 12.5 kg gas cylinder price increased to Rs. 5,175/-
